def.dt: :a usually rented room or set of rooms that is part of a building and is used as a place to live We lived in an apartment for several years before buying a house. compare condominium flat
:a large and impressive room or set of rooms usually plural the Royal apartments

:a large building that has several or many apartments We lived in an apartment building for several years before buying a house. called also (US) apartment house (Brit) apartment block (Brit) block of flats
:a small apartment that usually includes furniture and has a small and simple kitchen area
:a small apartment that is part of or next to a house and that is used especially as a place for an older relative to live called also (US) mother-in-law apartment (Brit) granny flat
:a small apartment that has a main room, a very small kitchen, and a bathroom called also studio (Brit) studio flat
